cookie.invalid: Error: The cookies you are using right now are invalid!
cookie.sidDescription: Session cookies can be found at
cookie.remidDescription: Reminder session cookies can be found at

discord.modIdDescription: Id of Moderator role, moderators can only kick players

mainPage.main: A new way to manage your Battlefield 1 servers
mainPage.description: Server Manager is a new Gametools & BFBan service created by Community Network

0.heading: BFBan Anti Cheat
0.body: Protect your servers against hackers confirmed on www.bfban.com

1.heading: Unlimited Global V-Ban list
1.body: Ban as many players as you want to on all your servers with virtal ban list.

2.heading: High ping players kick
2.body: Automaticaly kick players from your servers based on ping threshold.

3.heading: Discord tools to maintain server
3.body: Contol your servers right in the Discord based on roles.

4.heading: Server action logging
4.body: See full logs on every actions made on your servers and groups.

5.heading: Full control over your servers
5.body: Admins can controll server with same functions as in game.

createGroup.description: Create a new group to manage your community servers
createGroup.discordDescription: Optionaly, you can add your discord server, to integrate server tools
createGroup.cookieDescription0: Every group need to be assigned special account with certain requirments:
createGroup.cookieDescription1: It should be a BF1 server moderator (owner access not required)
createGroup.cookieDescription2: This account shouldn't be used anywhere else, otherwise it will lead in errors
createGroup.acceptDescription0: By pressing this button, you agree to give
createGroup.acceptDescription1: server manager tool access to the account.

admins.description0: Admin role can manage servers. You need to have at least
admins.description1: Owner role to add new admins.

servers.description0: Servers instances added to current group. You need to have
servers.description1: Owner role in order to add new servers.

owners.description0: List of current group Owners. This role can add new Servers,
owners.description1: Admins and other owners. Be carefull with it!

vban.description0: List of banned players on this group.

account.description0: Account manager, that will administrate your servers.
account.description1: These cookies can be found at

discord.description0: With our bot, you can allow admins to controll your servers
discord.gamestats: Add Game Stats bot on your Discord server, in order to control BF1 servers with commands.
discord.commandList: for a list of commands that you can use in Discord, use the "!bfadmin" command.
discord.permDescription0: Every person with that role id can use
discord.permDescription1: discord commands to contol the server.

settings.visableBansDesc: Allow your servers bans to be visable when someone checks if a player is banned somewhere else already:
settings.localeDescription0: The language tag used for the cookie, the server info like mapname will be in that language.
settings.localeDescription1: Language tags can be found at

danger.nameChange: You can change the name of current Group.
danger.deleteInfo0: Once you delete a group, it will remove all the servers,
danger.deleteInfo1: server account and users used in it.
danger.check: Are you sure you want to delete this group?

operations.description0: Setup operations gamemode on your server.
operations.description1: Note, that you will lose in-game admin panel!
operations.description2: Make sure to add server into this pannel and check it.
operations.acceptDescription0: By pressing this button, you agree to give
operations.acceptDescription1: server manager tool access to the account.

banList.description0: List of banned players on this server.
banList.description3: Use our group-based virtual ban list,
banList.description4: to ban unlimited amount of players.

vipList.description0: List of VIP players on this server.

adminList.description0: List of admins on this server.

firestarterList.description0: We measure when your server's preround ended and count all the players that are in the server when it starts,
firestarterList.description1: so you can check here who is helping you start your server.

spectatorList.description0: We keep a list of who spectated the server within the last 24 hours,
spectatorList.description1: because there exists a hack within Battlefield 1 that allows them to control players in the game itself...
spectatorList.description2: This is one way to fight back against those hackers.

playerLogs.description0: We keep a list of who is in the server within the last 24 hours,
playerLogs.description1: because a group of hackers keeps crashing the servers.
playerLogs.description2: This is one way to find out when/who did it.
playerLogs.description3: Filter the list to only show when a specific player is in the returned list:

protection.title: Auto server protection
protection.vBanDescription0: Introducing new tools developed to protect your servers against hackers.
protection.vBanDescription1: Global Virtual Ban list auto-kicks players on
protection.vBanDescription4: infinity amount of ban slots and synchronized ban list.
protection.vbanReasonDesc0: This msg appear to users who got
protection.bfbanDescription: Protect server agains known cheaters in
protection.pingKickDescription: Auto kick players with constant high ping
protection.pingKickMinDesc: Mimimum amount of players for autokick to start working (0 for always)

settings.title: Server settings
settings.name: Server Name
settings.aliasDescription: Alias to use with a Discord bot. (Can be a server number, for example)

kickMenu.main: You are going to kick player {{name}}
kickMenu.reasonDescription: This reason will be visibe to player! It is also limited in characters to 30, and allow only a few special symbols.

banMenu.main: You are going to ban player {{name}}
banMenu.reasonDescription: Enter a reason to ban this player.
banMenu.vBanOption: Use Virtual Ban instead of classic ban list
banMenu.tempbanDesc0: If you want to temporary ban him, specify time in
banMenu.tempbanDesc1: hours below, or leave it 0 to make permament ban.

vBanMenu.playerNameDescription: Fill in the name of the player you want to ban
vBanMenu.reasonDescription: Enter a reason to vBan this player.
